mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT (ACCT_NUMBER, ACCT_NAME, BANK_CODE, ACCT_TYPE, OVERDRAFT_LIMIT, BALANCE, OPENING_TIME, LAST_MODI_TIME) VALUES (#{acctNumber}, #{acctName}, #{bankCode}, #{type}, #{overdraftLimit}, #{balance}, #{openingTime}, #{lastModiTime});
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT SET BALANCE = BALANCE + #{snd}, LAST_MODI_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ACCT_NUMBER = #{fst}
mapper.select: select * from ACCOUNT order by ACCT_NUMBER desc
